title: 54: Land reform, stewardship, community ownership and land justice
subtitle: 54: Land reform, stewardship, community ownership and land justice
summary: This month’s episode brings more inspiring stories from the Oxford Real Farming Conference. We hear from a former MEP about UK land reform, learn about land stewardship in Scotland, talk to a community owned family farm, and chat about land justice and the future of land ownership in the UK. We also share an exciting new opportunity for you to get involved in a shared land-ownership model.
